body:
ReduceResult MaglevGraphBuilder::BuildStoreTaggedField(
    ValueNode* object, ValueNode* value, int offset, StoreTaggedMode store_mode,
    Node** store) { ... }

Located in maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc. This emits either StoreTaggedFieldNoWriteBarrier or StoreTaggedFieldWithWriteBarrier depending on CanElideWriteBarrier. It also handles escaping/virtual object initialization and delegates to TryBuildStoreTaggedFieldToAllocation when appropriate. Used in TryBuildStoreField for field stores and in other contexts (context cell stores, property cell stores, etc.).
explanation: Centralized helper that chooses the correct store node (with/without write barrier) and performs allocation/virtual-object notifications. Important anchor for store emission after Float64ToHeapNumberForField allocation path.
